Review.Titre: Too difficult to operate
Review.Contenu: Too difficult to operate. Makes NO sense.

Review.Titre: CAUTION delete form of payment.
Review.Contenu: CAUTION, When canceling this app. PLEASE remove any forms of payment from the app. I believe I canceled the app 3 months ago. and they still took payment from me. So just a little bit of warning. cancel your form of payment first. then cancel the app. THE MAIN REASON FOR CANCELLING OUR ACCOUNT. I could not change the date of the start of the month. our company month starts on the 11th of every month. we cannot alter this date. the main reason for us not using the app.

Review.Titre: Good but need to confirm each trip not always accurate
Review.Contenu: Hate that. You can’t delete auto classify and some trips are logged twice.

Review.Titre: it doesn’t calculate my stop to pick up…
Review.Contenu: it doesn’t calculate my stop to pick up my client & i lose $

Review.Titre: Well worth the subscription for its reliability
Review.Contenu: Using MileIQ has really taken the work out of tracking my business travel. The reporting is clear and takes little manipulation to make ready to submit for reimbursement. The only “fix” I would suggest is to be able to disable the auto-categorize feature altogether. That feature is likely a benefit to most, but my circumstances make the auto-categorize feature an annoyance when it comes up after denying it. But, otherwise, GREAT APP! I know I recoup the monthly charge every month simply because it captures every drive.

Review.Titre: Automatic Tracking of Drives.
Review.Contenu: Automatic Tracking of Drives! Excellent for a busy road warrior like me. I don't have time to track throughout a trip. I like that trips are captured and that I can categorize them at a future time. Tracking of trips is very accurate.

Review.Titre: Overall, Great!
Review.Contenu: Internet issues are not your fault!  Also some of my locations are so close that it’s difficult to delineate.  This may also be my fault.  Overall great!

Review.Titre: Great app
Review.Contenu: Very good. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that it does not calculate your total kms driven so when you drive over the 5000 km mark it does not automatically drop from .70c/km to .64c/km. Looks like you have to keep track when you drive over 5000 kms and the re-calculate at the lower rate.

Review.Titre: The app is good for tracking all of our…
Review.Contenu: The app is good for tracking all of our business trips. It is fairly easy to navigate the app.

Review.Titre: Easy accurate reports
Review.Contenu: Way use. Good tracking

Review.Titre: Your app simplify greatly my tracking…
Review.Contenu: Your app simplify greatly my tracking of mileage. I no longer need to manually note every single trip I do, which is a plus for me as before using you, I was forgetting to track many of them which ended up costing me money.

Review.Titre: This truly is one of my absolute apps!
Review.Contenu: This truly is one of my absolute favorite apps, way beyond my expectations! It is so intuitive in categorizing my business and personal miles.  It is a huge help because like most people, I would not consistently track and record very well but this tracks everything exactly automatically and it’s so easy to prompt whether it’s personal or business. Jerry

Review.Titre: Consistently Tracks My Car Trips
Review.Contenu: This app is almost the best thing since sliced bread! It consistently tracks the miles I've driven for each trip and gives me the chance to swipe right or left to file each trip under business or personal, respectively.  I have recommended this app to a number of colleagues and will continue to do so.

Review.Titre: This app is so very handy
Review.Contenu: This app is so very handy! I don’t have to remember anything on my own! It reminds me to log my drives regularly enough that I can remember if they were for work. It remembers my regular drives and automatically logs those. Then at the end of the month I just email HR my mileage and amount due!

Review.Titre: This is a fantastic app
Review.Contenu: This is a fantastic app, once you set up your classified drives, whether to the grocery store or to work it manages all of your drives for you. Great if you're self-employed!

Review.Titre: Easy way to track your mileage
Review.Contenu: Easy way to track your mileage for work. Can easily separate out personal/business drives.

Review.Titre: I use MileIQ every day and the app…
Review.Contenu: I use MileIQ every day and the app makes perfect sense for anyone using a vehicle for business. So simple to use and saves me lots of time. Highly recommended

Review.Titre: Great app
Review.Contenu: My accountant recommended I use it and it’s wonderful. Keeps track of all miles and prints reports.

Review.Titre: Best mileage tracker on the market!!!
Review.Contenu: Being able to separate personal and business mileage made MileIQ the simplest tool for our business.

Review.Titre: Until I started using MilesIQ
Review.Contenu: Until I started using MilesIQ, I only guessed at my business mileage.  I love how MilesIQ reminds me to swipe right or left daily.  It has made my life easy.

Review.Titre: Everyday
Review.Contenu: Everyday!  This app helps me keep my mileage all year and I highly recommend it for those that drive the same vehicle for work or personal.

Review.Titre: It is nice trusting that all my miles…
Review.Contenu: It is nice trusting that all my miles are tracked. I check once in a while and 99% are automatically tracked and the others I just swipe. It's very convenient and easy to use.

Review.Titre: Saves me hours each month from going…
Review.Contenu: Saves me hours each month from going through calendars or forgetting journeys taken.

Review.Titre: I really like the ease of it.
Review.Contenu: I really like the ease of it.This program makes mileage tracking so easy for business and personal tracking. I am so glad I found it.

Review.Titre: Easy to use.
Review.Contenu: Easy to use.Very intuitive. As a business owner, I appreciate the user friendliness. Thank you!!!

Review.Titre: Easy to use app with great tax reports!
Review.Contenu: This app is very easy to use and so glad that I found it. I have been using it for 11 months and now have the correct amount of miles to deducted opn my taxes!

Review.Titre: Ideal for small businesses and regular travellers
Review.Contenu: Useful tool to capture all your journeys. Even when you are too busy to start recording. Easy to use.

Review.Titre: Easy and accurate
Review.Contenu: Easy and accurate. A no brainer for anyone tracking their movement.

Review.Titre: Quick & Easy what else is there?
Review.Contenu: The app. is easy to use when needing to create an expense receipt, easy to read and log trip.

Review.Titre: Love the convenience
Review.Contenu: Love the ease of swiping to classify a trip. Refer to friends and colleagues.

Review.Titre: Great for keeping up with drives.
Review.Contenu: Love how simple it works. It runs in the background so I don't I have to remember to turn it on or login.
